member.name: DWRITE_LINE_BREAKPOINT
member.summary: Line breakpoint characteristics of a character.

member.name: DWRITE_LINE_BREAKPOINT.breakConditionBefore
member.summary: Indicates a breaking condition before the character.

member.name: DWRITE_LINE_BREAKPOINT.breakConditionAfter
member.summary: Indicates a breaking condition after the character.

member.name: DWRITE_LINE_BREAKPOINT.isWhitespace
member.summary: Indicates that the character is some form of whitespace, which may be meaningful for justification.

member.name: DWRITE_LINE_BREAKPOINT.isSoftHyphen
member.summary: Indicates that the character is a soft hyphen, often used to indicate hyphenation points inside words.
